#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
string rev(string str)
{
     int i,l;
     l=str.length();
     char temp;
     for(i=0;i<l/2;i++) 
     {
                        temp=str[i];
                        str[i]=str[l-1-i];
                        str[l-1-i]=temp;
     }
     return str;
}
int main()
{
    string str,rstr,str1;
    int t,i,j,k,c,c1,l;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
              c=0;
              k=0;
              c1=0;
              cin>>str>>str1;
              l=str1.length();
              for(i=0;i<str1.length();i++)
              {
                                          for(j=k;j<str.length();j++)
                                          {
                                                                     if(str1[i]==str[j])
                                                                     {
                                                                                        //cout<<str[j]<<endl;
                                                                                        k=j+1;
                                                                                        //cout<<j<<endl;
                                                                                        c++;
                                                                                        break;
                                                                     }
                                          }
              }
              k=0;
              str1=rev(str1);
              //cout<<str1<<endl;
              for(i=0;i<str1.length();i++)
              {
                                          for(j=k;j<str.length();j++)
                                          {
                                                                     if(str1[i]==str[j])
                                                                     {
                                                                                        //cout<<j<<"position"<<str[j]<<endl;
                                                                                        k=j+1;
                                                                                        //cout<<j<<endl;
                                                                                        c1++;
                                                                                        break;
                                                                     }
                                          }
              }
              //cout<<c<<c1<<endl;
              if(c==l && c1==l) cout<<3<<endl;
              if(c==l && c1!=l) cout<<1<<endl;
              if(c!=l && c1==l) cout<<2<<endl;
              if(c!=l && c1!=l) cout<<0<<endl;
    }
}
